TEXT.TITLE: JAPAN STILL WANTS SPECULATIVE DLR DEALS LIMITED
TEXT.BODY: The Finance Ministry is still asking financial institutions to limit speculative dollar dealings, Finance Minister Kiichi Miyazawa told reporters. He was responding to rumours in the New York currency market overnight that the Ministry was reducing its pressure on institutions to refrain from excessively speculative dollar dealings. REUTER
